name: Fish Bone
description:
Fall onto a planet where only water will survive. Explore, complete missions from the outback. Or even loot. In the world of Fish Bone, you will find different technologies, magic and eras on each island. play.


survival
-Explore resources It's the main factor you need to look for.
- Craft weapons, tools contribute to the number of more resource acquisitions.
-Build buildings such as walls to protect monsters.


Build a ship and decorate it
-artillery
- Armor
- large drill

survey
-Explore a world full of water You must have a vehicle
- Various treasures are waiting for you to find.


Play as a bounty hunter to receive large amounts of prize money

Build a workshop to produce tools and materials.
